segments.text: I think the woman is completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, but she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while standing in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would react if she saw them taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar that he doesn’t notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and fix everything before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
